title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
OB: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any functionality.
EB: The tab key should enable navigation or interaction within the Help view on Windows 2000.
SR:
To reproduce: 
        1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000.
        2. Try navigating using the tab key.
        3. Notice that the tab key does not have any effect.
